description: The outdoor urban pants with a balance of toughness and comfort, just as suitable for workwear as they are for commuting. Partially lined with a warm and durable flannel material, plus waterproof protection at the knees and seat for wet, cold projects.
name: Outdoor Research Lined Work Pants - Mens

specs.value: Feedback Lightweight Flannel Lining, 60% Cotton, 40% Polyester
